articles.author: Anniek Bao
articles.title: Asian semiconductor stocks rise after shares of AI chip darling Nvidia hit a record high - CNBC
articles.description: Nvidia's gains in share price lifted its market value to top $3.4 trillion, unseating Microsoft as the second most valuable company on Wall Street.
articles.content:
Asian chip stocks rose on Tuesday after Nvidia closed at a record high overnight as the chip company continues to ride the massive artificial intelligence wave.
Stocks tied to Nvidia suppliers as we… [+1838 chars]
